ygData.subject: RE: spells?
ygData.msgSnippet: Heh..  Play a rogue... Needun Luve, Rogue of the Rathe ... From:	Fling, Kirby [mailto:FlingKirby@GACNW.com] Sent:	Friday, July 23, 1999 12:43 PM To:
ygData.messageBody:
Heh.. Play a rogue...

Needun Luve,
Rogue of the Rathe

-----Original Message-----
From: Fling, Kirby
[mailto:FlingKirby@...]
Sent: Friday, July 23, 1999 12:43 PM
To: 'EQCheats@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [EQCheats] spells?

From: "Fling, Kirby" <FlingKirby@...>

Now, with all that said... does anybody else think
that necros are vastly
overpowered? They do FAR more damage than any other
class at all levels,
they get pretty much every combat-utility spell that
any other class gets
(like roots, disempowers, debuffs, etc), AND get the
ability to summon pets
of higher level than any other class.

Not to be a huge bitch or anything. I was fine with
that at first, but
since EVERY recent patch has included further
buffing or tuning of the necro
class it just seems to be getting a little absurd to
me.

Somebody tell me what the drawback is for their
class... being hated by
some NPCs? After having played a troll for several
months and being KOS by
EVERY npc north of innothule.... the necros have it
easy... like super-easy.
Then they went and gimped the shamans and I just
honestly can't figure out
what is going on. I'm guessing I'm not seeing the
whole picture or
something.... because recent events just haven't
made any sense to this
stupid troll.

-K




-----Original Message-----
Heart Flutter also drops a monsters AC by 47 and his
str by 17, hit it with
the 1st lvl spell Siphon Str and that gives 10 more
Str to you. So with
the 3 It is Slowed, Weakened, Has its Ac dropped a
good bit you are doing
about 400 points of damage in a min (The Dark Side
has a nice listing of the
spells and what they do per tick).
